title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1993 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Archives Act 1986 (Section
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Archives Act 1986 (Section 

1(2)(d)) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national archive act 1986 (section 1(2)(d)) order 2022

title: Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 1993 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The Schedule to the National Archives Act 1986 (No. 11 of 1986) is
text_raw:
2. The Schedule to the National Archives Act 1986 (No. 11 of 1986) is 

amended by the addition of “An Bord Pleanála”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [359] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 July, 2022. 

CATHERINE MARTIN, 

Minister for Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [359]
